profile_positions.description:
Municipality Master Plan Preparation Program of Local Government Engineering Department (LGED) under Upazilla Town Infrastructure Development Project (UTIDP)
This is a program of preparing Master Plan for municipality area. It provides more detailed planning proposals for specific sub-areas along with the Structure Plan, Land Use Plan and the Urban Area Plan. Major tasks of this project included-
•	Designing of questionnaire for relevant studies (FGD, Socioeconomic Survey, Transportation Survey, Environmental Survey, Formal & Informal Economic Survey, Industrial Survey etc.) and conduct the studies,
•	Collect all basic information regarding plan preparation, prepare reports and maps, develop GIS database for planning,
•	Prepare geo-referenced  mauza map after digitization and collection of hard copy mauza map from Department of Land Records and Survey (DLRS),
•	Monitor the surveyors and recheck the physical feature data,
•	Prepare land use plan based on structure plan proposals that will guide physical as well as economic development of the city,
•	Develop policies and strategies for urban basic services, for instance, water, health, education, gas, electricity, parks, recreation, waste, telephone, street lighting, etc.
•	Prepare standard road sections for proposed roads that are shown in the project area,
•	Selection of appropriate standards and guidelines for improving present conditions and guiding future development; prepare detailed area plan that specifies detailed plot by plot land use and zonal development guidance along with the name of proposed schemes,
•	Carried overall responsibility in work planning, budgeting, financial management and reporting.
•	Provided support in organizing workshops, seminars, conferences, dialogues and other interventions in terms of material preparation, logistical arrangements, collection and dissemination of relevant information ;
